mapper.select: select f.favorite_id, f.place_id, f.user_id, f.file_group_id, i.thumb_file_image_path, i.img_path, i.is_title, p.place_addr1, p.review_rate, p.place_name, f.created_at from tbl_favorite_place f inner join tbl_place_images i on f.file_group_id = i.file_group_id inner join tbl_place p on i.file_group_id = p.file_group_id where i.is_title = 1 and f.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_favorite_place ( place_id, user_id, file_group_id, created_at ) values ( #{placeId}, #{userId}, #{fileGroupId}, now() )
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_favorite_place where user_id = #{userId} and place_id = #{placeId}

( SELECT b.board_id AS id, b.board_title AS title, b.board_contents AS contents, b.board_author AS author, b.file_group_id, b.created_at FROM tbl_board b WHERE b.board_author=#{userId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT n.notice_id AS id, n.notice_title AS title, n.notice_contents AS contents, n.notice_author AS author, n.notice_fixed, n.created_at FROM tbl_notice_board n WHERE n.notice_author =#{userId} )
